name: Alacrity
description: Increases your spell casting speed by 100% and decreases spirit cost by 25% for 20 seconds.

name: Ambush
description: You meld into the environment. Become invisible to your enemies for 8 seconds or until you attack or cast another spell. Gain Ambush damage charges over time which will **greatly empower your next attack**.

name: Armor Shred
description: Deliver a powerful overhead chop, dealing 162 damage and each strike adds a **armor shred** on the target. Reduces the target’s physical defense by -20 for 10 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Aura of Life
description: Grants allies in radius with +414 maximum health for 20 seconds. Additionally allies in close proximity to you will get 12% increased healing received while the effect is active.

name: Barrage
description: Overwhelm your target with relentless pressure. Deliver a rapid series of thrusts, each striking for 148.

name: Blessed Breath
description: Regain **744 health** and **90 spirit** over the duration of the prayer. Can only be used while out of combat.

name: Blessed Breath
description: Regain **744 health** and **90 spirit** over the duration of the prayer. Can only be used while out of combat.

name: Blessed Breath
description: Regain **744 health** and **90 spirit** over the duration of the prayer. Can only be used while out of combat.

name: Bloodfed Grove
description: Place a 8 meter area lasting 5 seconds which applies a scaling heal over time based on the number of enemies inside the area for 106 | 112 | 123 | 123 | 135.

name: Breath of Balance
description: Replenish 74 stamina of a non-hostile target.

name: Breath of Balance
description: Replenish 74 stamina of a non-hostile target.

name: Breath of Balance
description: Replenish 74 stamina of a non-hostile target.

name: Breath Of Joy / Breath of Joy II
description: Increases movement speed by 20% for 8 seconds. (Breath of Joy II:) Sprinting does not consume stamina during the effect.

name: Breath Of Joy / Breath of Joy II
description: Increases movement speed by 20% for 8 seconds. (Breath of Joy II:) Sprinting does not consume stamina during the effect.

name: Breath Of Joy / Breath of Joy II
description: Increases movement speed by 20% for 8 seconds. (Breath of Joy II:) Sprinting does not consume stamina during the effect.

name: Breath of life
description: Regain **1086 health** over the duration of the prayer. Can only be used while out of combat.

name: Breath of life
description: Regain **1086 health** over the duration of the prayer. Can only be used while out of combat.

name: Breath of life
description: Regain **1086 health** over the duration of the prayer. Can only be used while out of combat.

name: Breath Of Spirit
description: Replenish 64 spirit.

name: Breath Of Spirit
description: Replenish 64 spirit.

name: Breath Of Spirit
description: Replenish 64 spirit.

name: Chronoseer
description: Advances all currently active cooldowns by 19 seconds.

name: Chrono Ward
description: Over the next 4 seconds any melee damage received will refresh all of your ability cooldowns. Can only activate once.

name: Commanding Strike
description: Swing your weapon with authority. Deal 130 damage and become **threatening**, 334% increased threat generation for 10 seconds.

name: Consecrated Ground
description: Consecrates an area surrounding the caster - increases defenses of all allies inside its limits by 21.

name: Crusader’s Bid
description: Deals damage based on the amount of **divine rapture** stacks on you. 199 | 319 | 478 | 677 damage. Consumes all stacks when used.

name: Crusader’s Closing
description: Deals damage based on the amount of **divine rapture** stacks on you. 274 | 440 | 659 | 933 damage. Consumes all stacks when used.

name: Detonation of Life
description: Place a 5 meter area which will burst after 2 seconds giving allies in the area 443 health.

name: Divine Intervention
description: Heal a target below 40% health for 336, otherwise heal for a reduced amount 152.

name: Divine Intervention
description: Heal a target below 40% health for 336, otherwise heal for a reduced amount 152.

name: Divine Orb
description: Fire a projectile which will splash 152 health to allies within 4 meters.

name: Divine Shield
description: For the next 4 seconds reflect all melee damage taken back to the attacker and heal for the same amount.

name: Earthquake
description: Smash down violently, fracturing the ground beneath you. The impact deals 391 damage and **weakens** enemies, reducing their damage by -12,3% for 18 seconds.

name: Forceful Strike
description: Perform a heavy strike, dealing 116 damage and **stunning** enemies for 2 seconds.

name: Frenzy
description: Increases melee attack speed by 27% and melee attack damage by 8% for 10 seconds.

name: Guardbreaker
description: Perform a heavy rising slash that breaks through blocks, dealing 337 damage. Successfully breaking a block briefly stuns the enemy.

name: Haunted Memories
description: Mesmerizes up to 3 enemies within range, rendering them paralyzed for 21 seconds or until they take damage. You can only mesmerize up to three enemies at any given time.

name: Heavy Thrust
description: Thrust the spear forward to deal 224 damage.

name: Impaling Strike
description: Drive the spear down to incapacitate your target, causing them to be **chained** for 7 seconds. Deals 411 damage.

name: Intercept
description: Leap forward to deliver a crippling strike, dealing 365 and reducing the target movement speed by 50% for 8 seconds.

name: Ironroot Grasp
description: While channeling, the caster becomes immobile, entering a trance-like state. Enemies within a 5m radius are **chained** to the ground.

name: Jester’s Flask
description: Throw a flask that splashes on impact, reducing the movement speed of affected enemies by 40% and reduces physical damage dealt by 12%. Lasts for 10 seconds.

name: Jolting Kick
description: Perform a kick that deals 192 damage and **interrupts** enemy spell casting. If a spell is interrupted, the target also becomes silenced for 10 seconds.

name: Killmark
description: Marks an enemy for 30 seconds, increasing all damage they take by 12%. Killing the marked target grants the killer increased movement speed for a duration.

name: Mental Fortitude
description: Makes you **immune to displacement** effects and increases your crowd control resistance by 25 for 20s.

name: Mesmerize
description: Mesmerizes enemy within range, rendering them entranced for 21 seconds or until they take damage. You can only mesmerize up to one enemy at a time.

name: Netfall
description: Throw a net forward that chains the first enemy hit for 10 seconds.

name: Overgrowth
description: Heal allies within 7 meters based on the number of **regrowth** stacks on them for 98 | 120 | 160 | 205 and refresh the duration of all **regrowth effects**.

name: Overhead Slam
description: Prepare for a powerful strike and slam your mace down, dealing 380 damage and 132 threat.

name: Overhook
description: Perform a full reach thrust for 367 damage. Pull the polearm back to launch the enemy behind your position. Enemy is **chained** for 2 seconds on landing.

name: Pacify
description: Places an unknowing target into a lulled state, reducing their awareness by -75%. Has no effect on enemies who are already aware of your presence. Effect lasts for 50 seconds.

name: Purify Self
description: Remove all harmful effects from yourself.

name: Purify Target
description: Remove a harmful effect from a friend.

name: Quick Remedy
description: Increases healing received by **25%** for **10** seconds. Heal yourself and allies in close proximity by **170 health**.

name: Quiet Stance
description: Increases all physical defenses by 18 for 8 seconds. Protects for the next 12 instances of damage. Reduces mobility for the duration. Can be turned off by activating again.

name: Radiant Cleave
description: A vicious twirling, forward moving attack - sending the axe blade’s razor cutting edge through anything within reach. Deals 333 damage on both swings.

name: Rallying Banner
description: Call down a battle standard that stuns enemies on landing. The flag motivates allies, increasing their attack speed by 9% while in its proximity. The flag disappears after 30 seconds.

name: Regrowth
description: Give a stack of **regrowth** to an ally, providing 14 | 27 | 39 health per second for 8 seconds. After 3 stacks have been applied, the next stack will overflow giving 152 health and removing all stacks.

name: Remedy
description: Heal a single ally, or yourself for 179 health.

name: Revoke
description: Remove all positive effects from an enemy.

name: Righteous Slash
description: Deal 214 damage. Each strike fills you with **divine rapture**, increasing attack speed by 4% and movement speed by 5% for 10 seconds. Effect stacks up to 4 times.

name: Righteous Strike
description: Deal 193 damage. Each strike fills you with **divine rapture**, increasing attack speed by 4% and movement speed by 5% for 10 seconds. Effect stacks up to 4 times.

name: Roar
description: Generates 50 aggro towards all enemies in a cone in front of you. Gain stamina over time based on how many enemies were affected.

name: Sacrament of Strife
description: Restore 39 health whenever you deal non-periodic melee damage to a target within 7 seconds. Effect can be activated up to 12 times.

name: Sanctified Stand
description: Increases all physical defenses by 33 for 8 seconds. Protects for the next 12 instances of damage. Reduces mobility for the duration. Can be turned off by activating again.

name: Searing Rage
description: When active gain 8% damage bonus and 8% Crowd Control effectiveness every time you take damage. Effect stacks up to 10 times.

name: Spirit Stride
description: Increases your movement speed by 20% and regenerates 6.1 Spirit per second for 7 seconds.

name: Surging Stride
description: Increase movement speed by 4% every second. Stacks up to 10 times. Effect lasts for 15 seconds.

name: Swift Jab
description: Quickly drive your spear forward in a focused thrust, dealing 194 damage.

name: Taunt
description: Taunts an enemy forcing them to attack you for a while. Additionally target's damage is reduced by -24% for 4 seconds.

name: Tempest Command
description: Become the eye of a storm. Command violent winds to spiral around you, pulling nearby enemies into your reach. Enemies are chained for 2 seconds upon landing.

name: Verdant Mend
description: Heals all allies within range by 245 health and grant them a blessing that increases healing received for 20s.

name: Vexing Sweep
description: Deliver a powerful sideways smash, dealing 321 damage and generating 100 threat.

name: Vicious Sweep
description: Swing in a broad arc, dealing 342 damage. All enemies struck gain **armor shred** charges equal to the highest count among targets hit.

name: Windlash
description: Pull an enemy to you and cause them to become **chained** for 2 seconds.

name: Zephyr of Life
description: Channel healing energy within 6 meter radius around you, giving 160 health up to 6 times.
